title: LAI Reading Group
text:
Lancaster AI (LAI) reading group is a weekly reading group focusing on topics related to AI, including but not limited to: diffusion models, information geometry, stochastic optimisation, geometric deep learning. It will be more tutorial-styled, instead of seminar-styled, tailored more towards people who wish to learn more about the recent developments of AI. This reading group is supported by the Prob_AI Hub.
In Term 1 24-25, we are learning diffusion models.
In Term 2, we will be doing reinforcement learning; in Term 3, we will be doing geometric deep learning.
Fylde D31 and over Teams; Wednesday 2-3pm (mostly).
See here for the full schedules; here for past sessions.

title: About
text:
The website is currently maintained by Rui Zhang and Andreas Makris.
Email Rui or Andreas for any question related to the reading group.

title: Resources
text:

Tutorials
